mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO APPOINTMENT (BOOK_ID, STUDENT_ID) VALUES (#{bookId}, #{studentId})
mapper.select: SELECT A.APPOINT_TIME, A.BOOK_ID, A.STUDENT_ID B.BOOK_ID "BOOK.BOOK_ID", B.NAME "BOOK.NAME", B.NUMBER "BOOK.NUMBER" FROM APPOINTMENT A INNER JOIN BOOK B ON A.BOOK_ID = B.BOOK_ID WHERE A.BOOK_ID = #{bookId} AND A.STUDET_ID = #{studentId}
